localised_text.tooltip_text: Bonus Objective||Completing a bonus objective does not grant you an instant reward, but increases the reward you will receive for accomplishing the primary objective of this chapter.
Primary Objective||Upon accomplishing this objective you will receive the offered reward, as well as any completed bonus objective rewards at the start of your next turn.
You do not currently have any active chapter objectives.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: You do not currently have any active chapter objectives.
